synopsis.text: After the destruction of Earth, the crew of the Solo Ship flees to the outskirts of the galaxy, carrying the powerful but unpredictable mecha Ideon. Pursued relentlessly by the Buff Clan seeking to claim Ideon's power, the remnants of humanity make their last stand, pushed to the brink of desperation. As the Buff Clan gathers their full military might, led by their massive new superweapon, Supreme Commander Doba gambles his people's future that this firepower can harness Ideon's strength. Meanwhile, the Solo Crew aims only to find a new home, but cannot abandon Ideon nor control its immense power that draws endless bloodshed. With nowhere left to run, the Solo Crew and Buff Clan race towards a final, decisive battle. Captain Bes Jordan and pilot Cosmo Yuuki struggle to defend their loved ones and their last hope for survival. As tensions reach breaking point, the war culminates in a duel between Cosmo and Buff Clan ace Harulu Ajiba, competing to protect their honor and homelands. This epic confrontation shall determine the fate of all life in the universe.
